timeline.bodyText: Moved this from SinkNode to here -- otherwise, we wrap the ClassCastException with a StreamsException and the SinkNode would not add the correct error message.
timeline.author: mjsax

timeline.bodyText: This test was not correct -- if we get a ClassCastExeption in RecordCollectorImpl#send() it would be wrapped by a StreamsException and not be thrown directly. Hence, the test setup a wrong condition and thus did not "catch" the bug.
timeline.author: mjsax
